title: How driverless cars will redefine the future (Video)
text:
Krisztian Bocsi/Bloomberg A Bayerische Motoren Werke AG (BMW) automobile is parked via a mobile device remoteâ€¦ more The future is getting closer every day, especially when we think about the prospect of driverless cars. McKinsey & Co.'s Dominik Wee discusses the reality of future transportation, and how driverless cars will affect not just the automative industry but others like insurance.
